attributes.action: Use less detentions in school and focus on rehabilitation
attributes.additional_details: Also it is hassle for the parents of the students because they have to arrange transport for the children this is not fair as they have their job to do also teachers could be planning lessons or marking work accept they have to supervise the student.
attributes.background: Dentations are used far to often in schools and are not successful in achieving any sort of rehabilitation, therefor we want teachers to speak to the student and see what the problem is and how they can help
